fields.name: required
fields.description: The field for the required record component.

fields.name: defaultPosition
fields.description: The field for the defaultPosition record component.

fields.name: fixedPosition
fields.description: The field for the fixedPosition record component.

constructors.name: PackSelectionConfig
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a PackSelectionConfig record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: required
methods.description: Returns the value of the required record component.

methods.name: defaultPosition
methods.description: Returns the value of the defaultPosition record component.

methods.name: fixedPosition
methods.description: Returns the value of the fixedPosition record component.
